skillTree.localised_description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!
All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: So much of war is an art. Over time and with much practice, combat moves can resemble a series of perfectly-rehearsed dance moves.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Only the best-greatest warriors can learn these techniques.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Death Runners and Eshin Triads units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: I tell you where to shoot-throw, you do as I say, yes!

skillTree.localised_description: From last job with man-things. Won't miss them.

skillTree.localised_description: Learned in the far-east. Watch, and do as I do!

skillTree.localised_description: Honored by Lord Sneek, yes-yes!

skillTree.localised_description: I distract, you stab-strike.

effects.description: Enable contact effect: "Overhelm" that greatly lowers melee damage and reload time reduction

skillTree.localised_description: Council of Thirteen directs me-me.
Can't hit what you can't see-see.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +3% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +6% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: Always another blade.
We keep moving! Eat those that can't keep up.
A rat that lives close to the flame leads a short life.
A nice warning-threat, to keep away the fools-fools. Of course, will need more heads to make more.

effects.description:
Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%
	(own characters in region)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.
True experience is born only on the battlefield.

Speed: +3% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +6% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

Speed: +10% for all units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Itâ€™s difficult to sleep with one eye open and a dagger under your pillow.
Sometimes itâ€™s best to have friends in low places.
Always watching.

skillTree.localised_description: Theyâ€™ve all heard the stories of this oneâ€™s accomplishments. The stories, of course, pale in comparison to the truth.

	(all characters factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.description: Vanguard Deployment||This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "I keep them sharp, yes-yes. Always ready for the challenge that I know is coming, yes-yes!"
"When they come for you, go straight for the throat and tear it clean out. They won't come again."
"Most precious of all substances, the pulse of our life."

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Warpfire Thrower, Warp Lightning Cannon and Doomwheel units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fightâ€¦ or when trying to get away afterwards!
Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.
Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Slow but good to get some nasty hits.
